issue.title: [Packaging][Python] Fix macOS wheel build failures
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9506](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9506). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- Python 3.7 tests were failing because of too many open files.
- There is an ssl issues during the artifact uploading in the 3.5 build.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9506?focusedCommentId=17159415) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7785
